problem.markdown: >>Which of the following are advantages of a PV solar tracker? << Choose the TWO characteristics that apply. [x] it can “follow” the sun like a sunflower [ ] it can generate wind energy [x] it is more efficient than a comparable roof-mounted solar system [ ] it can generate electricity at night [explanation] PV solar trackers, which move during the day to follow the sun, result in more electricity production thereby increasing the efficiency of the system. problem.p: Which of the following are advantages of a PV solar tracker? Choose the TWO characteristics that apply.

checkboxgroup.label: Which of the following are advantages of a PV solar tracker?
checkboxgroup.choice: it can “follow” the sun like a sunflower
it is more efficient than a comparable roof-mounted solar system
it can generate electricity at night

div.p: PV solar trackers, which move during the day to follow the sun, result in more electricity production thereby increasing the efficiency of the system.
